commit message: Initial work on a widget
More work on the Widget
Improved widget support. Moved at lot of the model to the Application class
Decoupled a lot of logic inside the app
Updated UI on the player widget.
Fixed FeedActivity colors
Added mute button to the widget for API levels 23 and above
Some minor optimizations during model loading
Fixed minor 'race' where the user could clear the queue while downloading a file
Upgraded gradle to 2.13 and downgraded the gradle plugin to 2.1
Cleaned up some code in the app podcats dialog
Optimized the notification flow. Subscriptions (FeedActivity UI) are now updated faster with fewer notifications
Moved som components to the application class
Fixed some minor issues
Removed icons from the preferences on api levels below 21
Moved to Exoplayer for playback
Migrated a lot of the notifiaction logic to ExoPlayer
Variable playback speed works
Ignored some screenshots
Working variable playback speed
Notify player state changed event when seeking
Removed zoom animation when swiping the view pager
Clean up the Discovery fragment, and implemented smaller list items.
Replaced all the fonts with the default version
Fixed some strings and small UI improvments
Enabled prefetching of images in the discovery tab. Tweeked the UI
Added a progress bar to the discovery view
Updated the welcome pages of various fragments
More visual tweeks. More consistent font,s searchview expanded by default
Prevent the Keyboard from popping up in the Discovery Fragment
Reduced the amount of notifications when subscribing to a Podcast
Added infrastructure for bulk insert of Episodes in a new feed
FeedParser: Much faster date parsing by adding caching of the parsers
FeedParser: More speed my optimizing profiler bottlenecks.
FeedParser: Postponed database writes until the feed has been parsed
FeedParser: Removed more notifications during parsing
Fixed an issue where the ExoPlayer would play from the start of the file, the first time the app starts.
Cleaned up the SoundWavesPlayer
Removed some locks and static classes. Should result in a faster an less memory hungry experience
Fixed download icon color
Updated the download queue infrastructure
Fixed FeedItem.equals
Bug fixes related to the widget
Fixed a bug related to subscriptions not being polulated properly when some episodes already where in the library
Made the subscription adapter faster and more robust.
Updated to version 0.136 (versioncode 280)
